text: The Sorbonne Nouvelle University is a French university located in Paris founded in 1971. The university mainly provides courses in letters, language sciences, languages, performing arts, communication and European studies (multidisciplinary history, economics, law and political science). Ranked in the top 50 of the best language universities in the world in the highly reputable QS World University Rankings in 2021, it is also one of the best universities in the country in many fields.Université Sorbonne Nouvelle Paris 3 == Famous former students == * Léonor Serraille, a French director and screenwriter * Jean-Pierre Thiollet, a French writer ==References== ==Other websites== * Université Sorbonne-Nouvelle, official web site Category:1971 establishments in France Category:Universities in Paris
title: Sorbonne Nouvelle University Paris 3
